players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "..."
You: "I think Charlie is mafia. He claims to have found me, but maybe he's lying."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice, she's mafia. Bob was killed last night, likely by her. I know I'm detective, so I'm not mafia. Vote Alice."
Charlie: "Bob died last night, I investigated Alice and she's mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she's lying. Vote Alice to stop her."
You: "Charlie, I didn't kill Bob. I didn't have the chance. Did you investigate the right person? Maybe you misread."
Diana: "I think Charlie is mafia. He claims detective but no proof. Alice says she didn't kill Bob, but if she were mafia she would lie. Vote Charlie."

You: "Bob died last night, I investigated Alice and she's mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she's lying. Vote Alice to stop her."
Alice: "Charlie, I didn't kill Bob. I didn't have the chance. Did you investigate the right person? Maybe you misread."
Diana: "I think Charlie is mafia. He claims detective but no proof. Alice says she didn't kill Bob, but if she were mafia she would lie. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
